body: Dear Mostapha, Thank you again for your time. Well my problem is not the genTestPts component its the recolor mesh component from LB. It does not recognize the amount of mesh faces v/s the results lenght. Other wise the runday analysis component returns the correct values.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Ug6ORo4NSNQoVf80Gl5vL8gddOmXWgfnHyd2C3NZFMjoioVikdVM*74h*8PRlNsrLKz0orSCNHk41WVBXYg5O0ZEoJcRRzve/Canvasat134003.png)
